channel.title: Maccy
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Added an option to show source application icons in the history. It's disabled by default and can be turned on in Settings / Appearance.
  • Added Polish translation,
  • Added Lithuanian translation.
  • Added Slovenian translation.
  • Added information about the database size on disk in Settings / Storage.
  • Improved support for copying and pasting to Chrome Remote Desktop application.
  • Improved support for copying and pasting to Netbeans IDE application.
  • Fixed an issue when single-text text would not wrap in the preview.
  • Fixed an issue when "Files" could not be checked in Settings / Storage.
  • A pin letter "Z" can no longer be used since it's reserved for a system undo shortcut.
